channel.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M5
channel.description: The latest traffic information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by the Highways Agency.

image.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M5

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M5 northbound between J6 and J5 | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M5 northbound between junctions J6 and J5, there are currently delays of 10 mins due to roadworks closing two lanes. Expect disruption until 6:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M5 southbound between J3 and J4 | Southbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M5 southbound between junctions J3 and J4, minor delays are possible due to roadworks closing one lane. Expect disruption until 5:30 am.
